text: Kikkan Randall has the admiration of a whole state behind her as she undertakes her battle against cancer. No doubt she’ll tackle this challenge with the same grace and internal fire that’s made her a champion for the ages. We’re all pulling for you @kikkanimal! https://t.co/ZcwgkZE19w

Today, after a very constructive meeting, I announced my intention to support Judge Brett Kavanaugh as the next Associate Justice of the Supreme Court. I believe he has the qualities Alaskans will value on the Supreme Court. See my full statement:
https://t.co/67Va28BGAs https://t.co/wfm5rd4S3b

I disagree w/ President’s remarks following Helsinki Summit. Specifically, do I believe the professional and patriotic men and women of our intelligence community, including the Director of National Intelligence, or a mafia regime leader like Putin? It’s not even a close call.

Sen. Ted Stevens stands in a league of his own in terms of dedication and contribution to the state of Alaska. He would want us to enjoy the Greatland as much as he did. So get out and play Alaska! #TedStevensDay https://t.co/TTSvzTnlQz
Great to join @USChamber to discuss potential of Indo-Pacific region and opportunities for continued U.S. economic engagement with friends and allies. https://t.co/7etpEFP9cx

Glad to see of Carl Perkins CTE reauth signed into law -- so important for school districts & students across the country. It provides critical funding for innovative CTE programs, while giving states & school districts flexibility to educate next gen of high-skilled workers. https://t.co/anNAzRZmYP

For the first time ever, the NDAA includes an authorization of up to six heavy, polar-class icebreakers for the U.S. Coast Guard – something that is long overdue. https://t.co/4UNxZGyEH0 https://t.co/RvJ5o06cS0
During my travels, I always try to stop in and visit with some of Alaska's many small businesses to hear firsthand from them and see their remarkable entrepreneur spirit.

On Friday, I had the opportunity to meet with @APDInfo Chief Justin Doll to discuss many issues, including those related to crime, public safety and efforts being taken to keep Alaskans safe -- issues that get raised with me often when meeting with Alaskans. https://t.co/tWXbXUuxMZ

Looking forward to welcoming so many of you for AK Wellness Summit #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave -- important gathering focused on issues of crime impacting our state & communities. If you can't attend in person, tune in live at https://t.co/TcWPKjqa8V or on my FB or website. https://t.co/bZS4d3Qcrn

The Alaska Wellness Summit 2.0 - Confronting Alaska's Crime Wave has commenced. Tune in Live!
https://t.co/dlmHm8D9zD

#ConfrontingAKCrimeWive

https://t.co/dlmHm8D9zD https://t.co/HRNaP90NWF

2 yrs ago, I had the honor of convening the Alaska Wellness Summit: Conquering the Opioid Crisis, an important gathering of federal, state & local community leaders dedicated to tackling the many challenges associated with the growing opioid epidemic. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

Nearly every day I hear from Alaskans about cars stolen and houses broken into. Shootings on our streets. Just days ago the Alaska Dept. of Safety put out their annual crime report. The numbers are staggering. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
FIRST PANEL DISCUSSION HAPPENING NOW: Setting the Stage – Alaska’s Crime Wave. WATCH HERE: https://t.co/TcWPKjqa8V #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

FIRST PANELISTS: Walt Monegan – Commissioner, Alaska Department of Public Safety (moderator), Justin Doll – Chief, Anchorage Police Department, Dr. Brad Myrstol – Director and Associate Professor, UAA Justice Center #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
WATCH LIVE: ALASKA WELLNESS SUMMIT 2.0 #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave https://t.co/X0VE86hmGG

WATCH LIVE: ALASKA WELLNESS SUMMIT 2.0 #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
https://t.co/dlmHm8D9zD https://t.co/0Sry7AUTxX

@kylehopkinsAK with @adndotcom talks about responsible journalism in the wake of Alaska's crime wave. His main objective now is covering who is committing these crimes and why. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
Responding to crime in Rural Alaska creates challenges and opportunities for innovation. AK Trooper Nasruk Ney is focused on building relationships throughout Rural Alaska. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

UP NEXT: @ComdtUSCG Schultz gives a keynote address on the critical role the U.S. Coast Guard plays as our nation’s first line of defense against drug smugglers seeking to bring illegal substances into the United States. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

.@ComdtUSCG Schultz reassured Alaskans of the commitment of the Coast Guard to fight drugs coming into the country. He said, "we have ownership and we have skin in the game and it’s time to double down and get after this scourge." #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
.@ONDCP Acting Director Jim Carroll up now. He has spent the last few days in Alaska meeting with local, state and tribal officials to help us combat drugs and crime. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

More from @ONDCP Acting Director Carroll: We need to work on stopping drugs coming into our country but also need to work on treatment and education and prevention. We need to reach the kids! #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

.@ONDCP Acting Director Carroll re: combatting opioid crisis: We all have a role to play. This is a local issue. If your house is on fire, you wouldn’t call DC. You want a local response. That’s what we’re trying to provide. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave https://t.co/DYzgwskwMC
Great to have @lisamurkowski join our fireside chat at the Wellness Summit 2.0: Confronting Alaska's Crime Wave here at @uaanchorage! https://t.co/YVf39IZZcU

Taking audience questions right now. To follow along live WATCH HERE: https://t.co/nfLQq5x1Df
#ConfrontingAKCrimeWave
Moving into our second panel featuring great state leaders discussing how we all are working together to combat crime. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

Alaska Attorney General Jahna Lindemuth re crime: it’s an all hands approach. It’s not only a public safety issue but a public health issue. Crime is a complex problem and takes better coordination with law enforcement and the community. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

I have worked with Victims of Justice very closely over the years. I’m glad to see that state and local officials -- including the @JuneauPD -- are working to give power to victims. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

Thanks to everyone that participated in our panel discussion on coordinated enforcement & cooperation among local, state & federal partners. We all have a role to play in combatting AK's crime wave. We must continue to work together to create a safe state where we can all thrive. https://t.co/03idLkbgH2

Moving into the last panel. What we have heard here so far is that this a complex, difficult and frustrating problem. We’ve talked a lot about numbers, but every one of them is a story of a person and a family who have suffered. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

Watch our final panel discussion of the Wellness Summit 2.0 here: https://t.co/dlmHm8D9zD
#ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

.@Alaska_DHSS Dr. Butler at Wellness Summit 2.0: The secret sauce in this discussion: collaboration between govts & non govt entities. It’s our problem. As Americans we don’t shoot our wounded. We have to treat this as a disease. We have to heal the wounds & prevent the wounds.

And thats a wrap! Thank you to @uaanchorage, all our panelists, and importantly, the countless Alaskans who took their time to be part of the solution. One of the biggest lessons today is that we all need to work together. We can beat back this crime wave. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

One of the true honors of my life has been having @SenJohnMcCain as a friend & mentor. He’s a true American hero. His courage & indomitable spirit have inspired millions in America & across the globe. I humbly ask all Americans to pray for him & his loving family. Semper Fi John.

Last Friday's Alaska Wellness Summit 2.0: #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave was extremely engaging, with lots of input and suggestions from Alaskans that my office and our federal partners will be taking back to DC. See our brief recap, here:
https://t.co/rg7E7A6tiV

Today we lost a true American hero. @SenJohnMcCain's life embodied steadfast patriotism & sacrifice in the service of a cause greater than self. His courage & indomitable spirit inspired millions in America & across globe. Our prayers go out to his wife Cindy & the McCain family.

I’m pleased to announce that the Senate recently passed the American Fisheries Advisory Committee Act, bipartisan bill to assist in the awarding of fisheries marketing, research and development grants known as the Saltonstall-Kennedy grants.  See more -- https://t.co/byoRabvHtz https://t.co/RHTiJqmZsr

Kodiak recently welcomed first of its five new HC-130J Super Hercules -part of the #USCG asset recapitalization efforts.  As CG Subcmte Chairman, I’m working to ensure we have broadest possible SAR coverage, response capability, & maritime domain awareness throughout AK waters. https://t.co/aR4h8pQTV5

Pro-Bono Work to Empower and Represent (POWER) Act, bipartisan legislation I first authored 3 years ago & signed into law this week, takes important steps to help combat the horrific statistics of domestic abuse and sexual violence we see in this country. https://t.co/Wr4zX4ozZw
#ShanahTovah to Alaska’s Frozen Chosen celebrating Rosh Hashanah this week. Best wishes for a happy and peaceful new year! https://t.co/88EHgZIroH
We will never forget the nearly 3,000 Americans lives – mothers and fathers, sons and daughters – taken from us 17 years ago. https://t.co/60epaVwVcu

BREAKING NEWS: The International Whaling Commission in Brazil voted to extend AK subsistence whaling quota for 7 yrs! A momentous day for North Slope & Bering Strait regions who will be able to continue their traditional cultural practice & provide food security for generations!

Allegations of sexual assault should be taken seriously. Professor Ford & Judge Kavanaugh deserve right to be heard on this matter. I commend Chairman Grassley on committing to as much & will be following closely as these claims are evaluated & reviewed. https://t.co/2z5NphTUpE
Today, my colleagues and I in the Senate overwhelmingly passed milestone legislation to further combat the opioid crisis and help some of the most vulnerable in our communities.

There have been a number of questions raised today regarding a protest in and directly outside of my Washington, D.C. office in opposition to Judge Brett Kavanaugh. Given the attention this has received, I believe it warrants a response.

https://t.co/3n6WY6dyjP https://t.co/RN0bPMMqtC
Thank you for all the well wishes and kind words following my very unexpected appendectomy yesterday. I’m doing well and feel very fortunate to have my wife Julie by my side.

I’m still reviewing the final text of the new U.S.-MX-CA Agreement released last night, but I'm glad to see Trump admin finalize this important trilateral agreement with our closest neighbors and two of our largest trading partners. See my full statement https://t.co/Y8XsQZhYBR https://t.co/9JeEua14me

Pleased to announce passage of the Save Our Seas Act, legislation I introduced w/ @SenWhitehouse   to address the global marine debris crisis. Bill, which now moves to @POTUS' desk, is important for the country, the world, and certainly AK. See more here https://t.co/s7uvDr2gSX https://t.co/j65iBYM0Gv

FAA Reauthorization Act is enormously important for AK & many communities in AK who rely on aviation for travel in & out of their communities & for goods & services — including many regional hubs. From gen av to cargo industry, lots of great AK victories.
https://t.co/CSe5ZfaH4a https://t.co/7TihMpUZP7

After months of engagement - 
 at all levels of gov't - Pacific salmon has been removed from the list of additional tariffs on Chinese imports. Read more https://t.co/IIEcKNhQXZ

The nation’s unrelenting opioid epidemic is taking hold all across the country & more must be done. I'm proud of bipartisan package of bills sent to @POTUS this week that address this crisis, w/ particular focus on wellness, prevention & innovation.   https://t.co/9ffIdvwhdd

In a Senate floor speech, I outlined extensive process behind my decision to support  JudgeKavanaugh's confirmation to #SCOTUS. This has been a searing process for many, not only in AK but across the country. This was was not a decision I took lightly.  https://t.co/kSsGaVS7sP https://t.co/ZJ4GlZC4wv

Ambassador @nikkihaley has been an instrumental force for the U.S. during her time at the @UN and her stalwart leadership will be missed. I thank her for her willingness to serve and wish her and her family well.

Grateful that @realDonaldTrump signed #SaveOurSeasAct that @SenWhitehouse & I, with so many other members on both sides, worked hard on to help with ocean debris crisis. Curbing this man-made plight in our oceans is an issue that we can all agree on!

Thank you @POTUS for signing the Save Our Seas (SOS) Act, bipartisan legislation @SenWhitehouse & I sponsored along w/ so many others to help address the marine debris crisis. Curbing this man-made plight on our oceans is an issue we can all agree on!

https://t.co/QYkZpfnfWR https://t.co/SnesZ9KhPL
Thanks @POTUS for signing the Save Our Seas (SOS) Act today! https://t.co/9s5NEQGCQy

Very pleased that @POTUS signed landmark bipartisan legislation to address opioid crisis that’s plaguing our state and country. We’re not going to fix this problem overnight, but the SUPPORT Act will make a big difference. https://t.co/YAbqmjwEeu

After years of perseverance, Yuut Elitnaurviat will be opening the first FAA-approved Part 147 Aircraft Maintenance School certified in the state in over 20 years, a critical component of the AK aviation system. Congrats Mike Hoffman team @ Yuut on this important announcement. https://t.co/qQVXEuKPsr
Great work by our professional and dedicated law enforcement in handling the recent pipe bomb threats. Violence in American politics is abhorrent and never the answer.
Prayers for the victims and families of the Tree of Life Synagogue. Anti-semitism, bigotry, and violence targeting houses of worship are not who we are as Americans.

Thank you to everyone who took part in our community meeting yesterday at the Palmer Senior Citizens Center – a wonderful facility that has provided housing and meal programs for our seniors for years. https://t.co/AG0e336Ktk

I had the opportunity to visit w/ Troopers at the AK State Trooper Mat-Su Detachment – the busiest detachment in the state; responsible for serving & protecting Alaskans in an area the size of W. Virginia – to discuss a number of important topics surrounding public safety & crime https://t.co/QRCO6v7DqV

Big thanks to the news teams at KVRF Radio Free Palmer and @matsu_news for hosting me yesterday to discuss some of the significant progress we’re making in Washington, D.C and some areas of particular interest to Alaskans. https://t.co/b3o5GnNcC9

I support the Trump admin's decision to reimpose sanctions lifted under the flawed 2015 nuclear deal. Under that deal, the Obama admin released tens of billions of dollars to the world’s largest state sponsor of terrorism to carry out their regional and nuclear ambitions.

Honored to have opportunity to lead this year’s Coast Guard Authorization, giving CG the resources & training they need to complete the many diverse missions. Bill includes many great things for AK, Arctic and relieving unnecessary burdens on fishermen  
https://t.co/83zC9ngupv

I applaud the nomination of retired General John Abizaid to be the next U.S. Ambassador to Saudi Arabia. I had the honor of serving as a staff officer to Gen. Abizaid when he was Commander of U.S. Central Command. I can’t think of anyone more knowledgeable and qualified than him.
